SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Factories.Interfaces

Interface ImgViewFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
ImgViewFactoryImpl
public interface ImgViewFactory
The ImgViewFactory interface defines methods for creating various ImageView components.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    javafx.scene.image.ImageView
    createBackgroundImageView(double width, double height)
    Creates a new ImageView for a background with the specified size.

    Creates a new ImageView with the specified asset name, width, and height.

  • Method Details

    • createImageView

      javafx.scene.image.ImageView createImageView(String assetName, double width, double height)
      Creates a new ImageView with the specified asset name, width, and height.
      Parameters:
      assetName - The name of the asset to be loaded.
      width - The width to which the image should be scaled.
      height - The height to which the image should be scaled.
      Returns:
      A new ImageView containing the specified asset.

    • createPauseButton

      javafx.scene.image.ImageView createPauseButton(double xPosition, double yPosition, double width, double height, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> action)
      Creates a new ImageView for a pause button with the specified position, size, and action.
      Parameters:
      xPosition - The x-coordinate of the pause button.
      yPosition - The y-coordinate of the pause button.
      width - The width to which the image should be scaled.
      height - The height to which the image should be scaled.
      action - The action to be performed when the button is clicked.
      Returns:
      A new ImageView representing the pause button.

    • createResumeButton

      javafx.scene.image.ImageView createResumeButton(double width, double height, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> action)
      Creates a new ImageView for a resume button with the specified size and action.
      Parameters:
      width - The width to which the image should be scaled.
      height - The height to which the image should be scaled.
      action - The action to be performed when the button is clicked.
      Returns:
      A new ImageView representing the resume button.

      Parameters:
      width - The width to which the image should be scaled.
      height - The height to which the image should be scaled.
      action - The action to be performed when the button is clicked.

    • createPauseMenuBackground

      javafx.scene.image.ImageView createPauseMenuBackground(double width, double height, double translateX, double translateY)
      Creates a new ImageView for a pause menu background with the specified size and translation.
      Parameters:
      width - The width to which the image should be scaled.
      height - The height to which the image should be scaled.
      translateX - The x-translation of the image.
      translateY - The y-translation of the image.
      Returns:
      A new ImageView representing the pause menu background.

    • createPlaneImageView

      javafx.scene.image.ImageView createPlaneImageView(double width, double height)

      height - The height to which the image should be scaled.
